awd_titl_txt: An Empirical Examination of the Determinants of Team        Performance
awd_abstract_narration: The PI proposes  to investigate high performance work teams.  His partner in this Private Sector Initiative, Sara Lee Knit Products, has found considerable variation in the performance of the work teams implemented throughout their organization.  The PI will test work team performance models in three textile plants.  Qualitative and quantitative analyses will be performed on a 12-month longitudinal data set containing work team performance measures, employee perceptions, and team composition information.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: Division of Social and Economic Sciences
